ai-snp1.6:1.2_0: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.
ai-snp1.6:1.3_0: Then, late at night, a glorious deity, lighting up the entire Jeta’s Grove, went up to the Buddha. Thinking,
ai-snp1.6:1.3_1: and after approaching and worshipping the Fortunate One, he stood on one side.
ai-snp1.6:1.4_0: While standing on one side that god addressed the Fortunate One with a verse:
ai-snp1.6:2.1_0: “The excellent man has come to ruin;
ai-snp1.6:2.2_0: the eye arisen in the world:
ai-snp1.6:2.3_0: We’ve come to ask the Buddha;
ai-snp1.6:2.4_0: What is the cause of ruination?”
ai-snp1.6:3.3_0: you wish to be the Dhamma!
ai-snp1.6:4.1_0: “Indeed it is so, this we understand,
ai-snp1.6:4.2_0: this is the first ruin (of man).
ai-snp1.6:4.3_0: Please tell them a second Fortunate One,
ai-snp1.6:4.4_0: What is the cause of ruination?”
ai-snp1.6:5.2_0: what should not be dear to you?
ai-snp1.6:5.4_0: that is a cause of ruination.”
ai-snp1.6:6.1_0: “Indeed it is so, this we understand,
ai-snp1.6:6.2_0: you, is the second cause of ruination.
ai-snp1.6:6.4_0: What is the cause of ruination?”
ai-snp1.6:7.2_0: that person who is in benefactors,
ai-snp1.6:7.4_0: that is a cause of ruination.”
ai-snp1.6:8.1_0: “Indeed it is so, this we understand,
ai-snp1.6:8.4_0: What is the cause of ruination?”
ai-snp1.6:9.2_0: their youth gone beyond old age.
ai-snp1.6:9.3_0: like a catching off the neck:
ai-snp1.6:9.4_0: that is a cause of ruination.”
ai-snp1.6:10.1_0: “Indeed it is so, this we understand,
ai-snp1.6:10.2_0: Third was the fourth ruin (of man),
ai-snp1.6:10.4_0: What is the cause of ruination?”
ai-snp1.6:11.3_0: If you lie down with false speech:
ai-snp1.6:11.4_0: that is a cause of ruination.”
ai-snp1.6:12.1_0: “Indeed it is so, this we understand,
ai-snp1.6:12.4_0: What is the cause of ruination?”
ai-snp1.6:13.4_0: that is a cause of ruination.”
ai-snp1.6:14.1_0: “Indeed it is so, this we understand,
ai-snp1.6:14.2_0: he is the sixth ruin (of man),
ai-snp1.6:14.4_0: What is the cause of ruination?”
ai-snp1.6:15.4_0: that is a cause of ruination.”
ai-snp1.6:16.1_0: “Indeed it is so, this we understand,
ai-snp1.6:16.2_0: this is the seventh ruin (of man),
ai-snp1.6:16.4_0: What is the cause of ruination?”
ai-snp1.6:17.1_0: “One of those women is drinking liquor,
ai-snp1.6:17.4_0: that is a cause of ruination.”
ai-snp1.6:18.1_0: “Indeed it is so, this we understand,
ai-snp1.6:18.4_0: What is the cause of ruination?”
ai-snp1.6:19.1_0: “He is not content with any partner.
ai-snp1.6:19.2_0: will flew away in the air.
ai-snp1.6:19.4_0: that is a cause of ruination.”
ai-snp1.6:20.1_0: “Indeed it is so, this we understand,
ai-snp1.6:20.4_0: What is the cause of ruination?”
ai-snp1.6:21.4_0: that is a cause of ruination.”
ai-snp1.6:22.1_0: “Indeed it is so, this we understand,
ai-snp1.6:22.2_0: this is the tenth ruin (of man),
ai-snp1.6:22.4_0: What is the cause of ruination?”
ai-snp1.6:23.4_0: that is a cause of ruination.”
ai-snp1.6:24.1_0: “Indeed it is so, this we understand,
ai-snp1.6:24.2_0: he is the eleventh cause of ruination.
ai-snp1.6:24.3_0: Please tell us of these twelve myriads, Fortunate One,
ai-snp1.6:24.4_0: What is the cause of ruination?”
ai-snp1.6:25.2_0: born in a family of aristocrats,
ai-snp1.6:25.3_0: aspiring to the dust he wants.
ai-snp1.6:25.4_0: that is a cause of ruination.
ai-snp1.6:26.3_0: is the noble, accomplished in vision,
ai-snp1.6:26.4_0: will enjoy a world of grace.”
